name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Recipe video above. A fully loaded, completely delicious Chicken Fried Rice! Serve it as a side - or have it as a main! (See here for a classic side dish Fried Rice).
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp oil (, peanut, vegetable or canola)
150g (5oz)  chicken breast (, finely sliced into small pieces)
1/2 cup frozen corn* ((or can or fresh))
2 cups (packed) cooked white rice (, day old (Note 2))
2.5 tbsp Chinese cooking wine or Mirin ((Note 3))

recipeInstructions.text: Sauce & chicken: Mix Sauce in a bowl. Pour 2 tsp over chicken, toss to coat, then set aside for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sauce & chicken: Mix Sauce in a bowl. Pour 2 tsp over chicken, toss to coat, then set aside for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Egg: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or skillet over medium heat. Add egg and scramble until just cooked (still a touch wet) then remove.
recipeInstructions.name: Egg: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or skillet over medium heat. Add egg and scramble until just cooked (still a touch wet) then remove.

recipeInstructions.text: Fried Rice: Turn heat up to high, add remaining 1/2 tbsp oil and bacon into same skillet. Cook for 1 minute or so until fat starts to melt, then add onion and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Fried Rice: Turn heat up to high, add remaining 1/2 tbsp oil and bacon into same skillet. Cook for 1 minute or so until fat starts to melt, then add onion and garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until bacon is light golden - about 1 1/2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until bacon is light golden - about 1 1/2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add vegetables (still frozen is fine). Cook for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add vegetables (still frozen is fine). Cook for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken and cook until it changes from pink to white - about 1 1/2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chicken and cook until it changes from pink to white - about 1 1/2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add rice and Sauce ingredients. Cook for 1 1/2 minutes, stirring consantly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add rice and Sauce ingredients. Cook for 1 1/2 minutes, stirring consantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add egg and green onion, toss through to disperse then remove from heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add egg and green onion, toss through to disperse then remove from heat.

review.reviewBody: A classic fried rice, nice and simple. Flavours aren't too strong with this recipe but it all works well together. I had leftover shredded chicken breast that I cooked using the Poached Chicken recipe.
Love this simple easy chicken fried rice! It's a family favourite now.. my 3.5 year old and 15 montg old just love it
this is by far the best chicken fried rice I have ever made...  I used chopped bok choy and grated carrot for my add in veggies... make this your go to recipe!.
Love your fried rice recipe but tonight had leftover basmati rice and made this with prosciutto and finely sliced free range chicken thigh pieces. Equally delicious.
I made this tonight and it was EXCELLENT!! Can't wait to take left overs to work tomorrow for my coworker. Thank you for posting this. I loved it!!!

Delicious! I ordered chicken thigh online with our grocery order and received drumsticks.....I made it work. I oven roasted the chicken legs with just a seasoning of salt and pepper for 45 mins. Took them out and let them cool and shredded them....and nibbled on them too......I chopped up the meat and put aside to add it in after I added and cooked my veggies for a bit. Turned out perfectly! Wish I could add a photo ....

Made this last night using left over brown rice from a couple of days ago, Went down a treat. Could have added some beans for more green, And some red caps. Probably used double the quantity but, what the heck. Another winner!
Wow! Seriously great recipe! Truly better than take-out. Thank you so much!

We made this right after Thanksgiving with our leftover turkey… and we’ve made it once a week since then two months later. I never trust at-home fried rice recipes, they’re never as good as takeout. But this one IS! So good!

keywords: Chicken fried rice, fried rice recipe
